title: Life Is Paradise with Noah and Abigail
description:
Noah and Abigail stop by “Bachelor Happy Hour” to fill Bachelor Nation in on how they've been since leaving Paradise separately last summer!

In their conversation with ​Becca and Michelle, Noah and Abigail reveal how long after leaving Mexico they got back together, what they are most looking forward to now that they are living together, and how they both REALLY feel about Blake Moynes' recent IG jab. Plus, they spill some tea on how that infamous prom night really went down. 

Then, in a fun game of "Finish the Sentence," Noah and Abigail show off their sweet side, and Michelle shares details from her recent trip to Mexico with Nayte.

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode!

Thanks to our sponsor:

Jenni Kayne: JenniKayne.com code BHH
